name: Froggies Only
description:
A short dating sim about a frog and his quest for happiness.

Made by some kid who doesn't sleep in just under 72 hours for the Frog Jam game jam.

FEATURING

  • At least Two(2) high quality mini games.
  • Pictures of frogs.
  • High class frog related humor.
  • Branching dialogue.
  • (Potentially) A heart-warming ending.
  • Slightly less spelling errors than you'd expect from someone with no sleep.

BUGS I KNOW ABOUT

  • There's a small chance for a dialogue box to not trigger and soft-lock the game at the transition from day 1 to 2.
  • Some of the windows overlap weirdly.
  • One of the sprites in the end sequence is sized incorrectly.
  • There's a small chance for the game to not properly reset upon failing in the first scene, but it'll fix itself after a couple repeats.
  • Were doesn't have an H in it.

NOTE

As to comply with jam rules, here is a list of public domain assets used

  • A laugh from this
  • A frog croaking
  • This picture of a frog
  • All the fonts used came from here, all fonts used are under public domain
